attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Compensation should of course be paid to the farmers at the centre of the Foot and Mouth crisis, but the impact is also felt by the wider rural community. We believe that compensation should also be offered to those whose reasonably expected earnings will be adversely affected by the crisis (eg in the tourist trade, agricultural suppliers, small village retailers)

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "compensate all businesses affected by Foot and Mouth and recognise the social as well as economic impact it will have on the countryside."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16846
